description: Records that are obsolete in the project
sql:
SELECT B.RECNAME
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A,
     PSRECDEFN B
WHERE A.OBJECTTYPE = 0
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = 1
  AND A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.RECNAME
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = 0
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLFIELD C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 5
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 9
       AND C.PNLNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.RECNAME
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSRECFIELD C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 0
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 1
       AND C.RECNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.EDITTABLE
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSRECDEFN C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 0
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 1
       AND C.RECNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.RELLANGRECNAME
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLGRPDEFN C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 7
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 10
       AND C.PNLGRPNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND (B.RECNAME = C.SEARCHRECNAME
            OR B.RECNAME = C.ADDSRCHRECNAME)
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
notes: Records in the project that do not exist on a page in the project, do not exist as a prompt record for another record in the project, do not exist as a related language record for a another record in the project and do not exist as a search record for a component in the project.
